name: Boost360 for Doctors
author: NowFloats Technologies Pvt Ltd

sections.description:
Convert your WordPress website into an Online Clinic or watch video.

  • Manage your patient appointments directly using the Boost app (available on android, ios and web).
  • Create and showcase your e-profile to patients
  • List your services, add health tips and relevant updates for your patients
  • Enable patients to book appointments for:
    ** Clinical consultation
    ** Online consultation
  • Easy appointment scheduling & fee collection
    ** Send reminders
    ** Enable pay-Later
  • Collect and manage patient Feedback on every appointment
  • View and manage patient records associated with completed appointments
  • E-prescriptions
  • HIPAA compliant and encrypted data storage
  • Social media management
  • Multiple doctor support for a clinic

Support

If you are already using Boost360:
* You can find the wordpress integration details within the app. Go to Menu -> Settings -> Boost Extensions -> WordPress
* If you are facing any issue with the plugin you can reach to your support account manager using the app. Go to Menu -> Help and Support

If you do not have access to Boost360 app, please write an email to ria@nowfloats.com

<?php code(); // goes in backticks ?>
sections.installation:
How to install the plugin?

  1. Install “Boost360 for Doctors” plugin and activate the plugin.
  2. Go to Settings > Boost360 for Doctors
  3. Follow the steps mentioned to enable Online Clinic functionalities
  4. Ensure that in your Boost account you have your doctor’s profile created & approved. This is to ensure that only valid doctors (with Medical License registered in India) are able to consult online.
sections.faq:
Where can i get more details about Boost360 for Doctors?

You can visit https://online-clinic.getboost360.com and check out the features.
sections.changelog:
1.1.3

  • Updating the assets and readme (installation and screenshots).

1.1.2

  • Capture Integration key for enabling Boost social media sync.
  • Sync publihsed posts and uploaded media, to multiple digital channels via Boost360.

1.0.0

  • Ability to enter the wordpress-plugin script.
  • Script would be dynamically inserted to the footer of all pages.
